nodes.name: onlyRegisteredUser
addProduct
buyProduct
updateProductName
updateProductPrice
updateProductAvailability
updateProductVAT

addProduct(bytes32,uint256,uint256,uint2.details: Adds a new product to the system, owned by the business owner who calls the function

params._VAT: The VAT of the product to add
params._availability: The availability of the product to add
params._name: The name of the product to add
params._price: The price of the product to add

buyProduct(uint256,uint256).details: Allows the the registered user who calls the function to buy a certain quantity of a product if it has enough     cubits

params._amount: The amount of products to buy
params._productId: The id of the product to buy

constructor.details: Sets the correct instance of ContractManager so that the contract may be able to call functions from other     contracts

params._manager: The address of the instance of ContractManager

updateProductAvailability(uint256,uint25.details: Function used by the owner of a product and this contract in order to change the availability of a product

params._availability: The new availability of the product
params._productId: The id of the product whose name to change

updateProductName(uint256,bytes32).details: Function used by the owner of a product and this contract in order to change the name of a product

params._name: The new name of the product
params._productId: The id of the product whose name to change

updateProductPrice(uint256,uint256).details: Function used by the owner of a product and this contract in order to change the price of a product

params._price: The new price of the product
params._productId: The id of the product whose name to change

updateProductVAT(uint256,uint256).details: Function used by the owner of a product and this contract in order to change the availability of a product

params._VAT: The new VAT of the product
params._productId: The id of the product whose name to change
